Playlist T-Dose 2007
http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLBZBIkixHEieGLtIxfaL1y1QPBLTUSegB

T-DOSE 2007, An Introduction to Haiku, an Open Source OS For the Desktop, Niels Sascha Reedijk.

This talk is designed to introduce the audience to Haiu, a new open source operating system inspired by the Be Operating System and designed from the ground up for desktop computing. During the talk there will also be a demonstration of the Haiku OS.

More at
http://www.t-dose.org/2007/speakers

Technical Dutch Open Source Event.
October 14, 2007
Fontys Eindhoven.
title: T-DOSE 2007, An Introduction to Haiku, an Open Source OS For the Desktop, Niels Sascha Reedijk
